title: What if an OCE All-Star wasn't in the OPL?
body:
Conspiracy, yes...

Hi fellas, i'm Brad or known on league as Braddddy or Dunbt.

I'm a Diamond 5 (0LP) Pleb lord scrub of the century support main.
I have come to the miscellaneous boards with a miscellaneous proposal.

As I believe my teams hold me back from being the true support GOD that i'm told day in and day out by my fellow Diamond 5 (0LP) peers,
I believe that just because someone isn't in the OPL doesn't mean they can't run for being a candidate of the OPL All-Star team.

Now I know no one will bat an eye because I am a Diamond 5 (0LP) Pleb lord scrub of the century support main, but i'm here to tell you that I bring alot to the table.

My unique Alistar mechanic which I have yet not seen in any of my games played against/with fellow support main plebs (will not release this information of the mechanic as then it wouldn't be unique and i'm saving it up so I can have a mechanic named after me) is phenomenal.

I'm frequently called the Thresh GOD by my fellow ranked teammates, I flay Lee Sin's Q, Shyvanas Ultimate, Pantheon's stun, Caitlyns Caliber net, (more included)

My lanterns have saved a percentage of 88% lives in my surge in Solo Q Sadness - (Statistic based on 100 games).

My Braum is more manlier then Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson chest pressing 260KG for 10 reps.

Now don't even get me started on the synergy with Bard.

My Bard play is considered the BEST in Oceania. I believe i'm better then any Oceanic support at Bard and if anyone disagrees I offer them a 1v1 on the Howling Abyss, Bard only.

Now I don't want to impress you all too much, So I won't run through Nami, Morgana & Janna. (Even though my Janna will blow you away).

So after all this banter I offer myself to be the Oceanic All-Star teams support and lead us to greatness.

I can't promise coca-cola to come from your kitchen sink taps, I can't promise world peace, I definitely cannot promise to negate Australias Ice epidemic... But what I can promise is great leadership and the best support in Oceania to carry us to the next level.

So fellow non OPL Players, VOTE #1 For Brad.

Because Brad is your dad.
Rad.

replies.body:
I vote 1/2 for brad.

For being not so rad. 

Cuz if you cant stop the ice epidemic then you are not worth considering... No I am not being unreasonable

Not at all...

(for real though, I don't like calming down my friend who just survived a nutter who is 6 years older then him and had a box cutter. Knowing I can't call the ambulance and shit cuz he is high and loaded with stuff)
